english.segment1: What do You see when You look at me?. Ten dollar words and philosophies. How would You choose to define me. Cares for others or just cares what others think?
english.segment2: But there is more to me than just what meets the eye. It's time to be the change inside
english.segment3: I wanna' look like love. I wanna' look like, live like faith. I wanna' let this life in me show on my face. I wanna' look like hope. I wanna' look, live like grace. And I know just where to start. I'll let you be my beauty mark
english.segment4: Lookin' the part just to play the game. Cookie cutter faith that looks the same. Religious rock stars making a name. So churchified it is a crying shame. But I'll put the finger on nobody else but me. (Nobody else but me). It's time to be the change we need
english.segment5: I wanna' look like love. I wanna' look like, live like faith. I wanna' let this life in me show on my face. I wanna' look like hope. I wanna' look, live like grace. And I know just where to start. I'll let you be my beauty mark
english.segment6: Dressed up in. Love and joy, peace and kindness. Gentleness and self control. Nothing, nothing is more beautiful. Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeahey
english.segment7: I wanna' look like love. I wanna' look like, live like faith. I wanna' let this life in me show on my face. I wanna' look like hope. I wanna' look, live like grace
english.segment8: And I know just where to start. I'll let you feel my beauty mark
english.segment9: I'm gona' let you be my beauty mark. Yeah, yeah, oh, oh
english.segment10: I wanna' look like hope (look like hope). I wanna' look like, live like grace. And I know just where to start. I'll let you be my beauty mark
english.segment11: I'll let you be my beauty mark
